name: Earthling
description:
Fight for the entertainment of eldritch baddies in gladiatorial combat. They've abducted you to be their newest circus act in a fight to the death, so put on a good show...

  • Use LEFT/RIGHT to control your explosive spear as it flies towards your enemy. The deeper it flies into his body, the higher the damage.
  • When the enemy attacks, use WASD to strafe, LEFT/RIGHT to turn, UP to toss a spear, and SPACE to detonate a spear.

(This is a portfolio piece from a long time ago, so usability is not the best. I apologize for the atrocious control scheme.)

Code by Khaled Abu-Ghazaleh

Art by Ryan O'Hara (That's me!)
